channel.title: PvP Turf - Needs Development Team
channel.description:
Hello. I need about two dedicated server coders, and two client coders, who can code a 474 Refactored Client. I'm not sure what it's called. I'm not a great coder myself, and don't know much. My buddy, who coded the source from a Shard, is resigning, from conflicts between us and PT's Future. I want a team who can code happily, and without HUGE conflicts. For the first few weeks, you will NOT have access to the VPS. I am also looking for one GFX Masters, and maybe one Web Designer.
Look, I'm not looking for "professionals" who don't know anything. I need the team to be good, and know what they are doing.
Server Coders: - -
Client Coders: - -
GFX Masters: -
Web Designers: -
Post below if you have questions/comments.

item.title: PvP Turf - Needs Development Team
item.dc:creator: @PvPTurf PvPTurf
item.description:
@PvPTurf wrote:

This is my new account. I had a mod ban Mrtms. I don’t need a development team anymore.

Read full topic
